HADOOP FINTECH LTD

Hadoop Fintech is a leading multinational corporation in the digital marketing industry, specializing in cross-device advertising and mobile apps publishing.

About Us

Fully Compatible across Devices

As different devices have diversified characteristics and functions, it is necessary for advertisers to compose customized ad creatives accordingly for different devices and audience. A majority of the big companies have already started to adopt cross-device marketing to keep their customers surrounded by their brand images.

Controllable Costs in Ad Delivery

Hadoop helps advertisers effectively control the promotion costs by providing a variety of pricing models, including CPA and CPC.

Access to Billions of Customers

Hadoop has cooperated with more than 1000 high-quality media, and integrated their ad networks to cover multiple subjects, including finance, IT, automobile, news, entertainment, sports, women, etc. These channels can bring more than 100 billion monthly traffic , and reach over 85% of the global Internet users.
